title: Off the Hook
description: I've disgraced my family.They want to send me away. They want me gone.Out of sight, out of mind...Only one person stands in their way.Nathan.He has a decision to make.A life-altering choice.Can he do this?Does he want me?It's not just about us anymore.I'm a two for one deal...   Off The Hook is the third installment of the Faking It series. Due to its explicit content, bad language, and graphic sexual content, Off The Hook is recommended for mature readers of seventeen years and above.
author: Chloe Walsh
